description: Indicates if the file is REFRESHED/UPDATED/NOT APPLICABLE – literally “REFRESHED”, “UPDATED         ”  or“                                                     “
Literally “A”; indicates the end of the header record
RECORD ID SEQUENCE NUMBER, begins with“00000001”
ACCOUNT NUMBER, including Office (3), Base Account (5), Check Digit (1)
INVESTMENT PROFESSIONAL (IP) NUMBER; NOTE: For three-character IP Numbers position 24 will be “”.

RECORD TYPE; value includes:
“0” = Transfer Level record

TRANSFER TYPE; values include:
“FRV” = Fail Reversal
“FUL” = Full Transfer
“MFC” = Mutual Fund Clean-up
“PTD” = Partial Transfer Deliverer Initiated
“PTR” = Partial Transfer Receiver Initiated
“RCL” = Reclaims
“RCR”= Residual Transfer
TRANSFER STATUS; see Appendix T for values
NUMBER OF DAYS IN PERSHING STATUS

RETIREMENT ACCOUNT CLASS INDICATOR; values include:
“B1” = IRA for which Pershing LLC is the Custodian
“B2” = IRA for which Pershing LLC is not the Custodian
“B3” = IRA where Pershing LLC acts as a servicing agent
“  ” = Non-retirement account
REQUEST CREATION DATE, in CCYYMMDD format
LAST UPDATE DATE, in CCYYMMDD format

TOTAL MARKET VALUE SIGN; values include:
“+” = Debit Amount
“-” = Credit Amount
“  ” = Not Applicable

SOURCE CODE; values include:
“DRD” = Direct Rollover Due to Death
“DRQ” = Direct Rollover
“ROC” = Roll Over Contribution
“TOA” = Transfer of Account

SPECIAL MEMORANDUM ACCOUNT SIGN; values include:
“+” = Debit Amount
“-” = Credit Amount
“  ” = Not Applicable
NSCC ACCOUNT TYPE; see Appendix T for values
NSCC STATUS; see Appendix T for values
NUMBER OF DAYS IN NSCC STATUS
REASON CODE FOR REJECT; see Appendix T for values
Literally “X”; indicates the end of detail record A

Indicates if the file is REFRESHED/UPDATED/NOT APPLICABLE – literally “REFRESHED”, “UPDATED
”, or “
”
Literally “Z”; indicates the end of the trailer record
